Name: 메스가키 영애님!
About the game: ♠ Synopsis 'Twenty questions party with Young-ae!' A high school boy who hates chaebol misses his childhood friend Lee Ga-young, who broke up in elementary school. As a timid elementary school student, however, she returned to Young-ae, an active talker Lee Ga-young, who became a conglomerate's hero, offers him 20 questions full of falsehood with opposite personalities... - 20 questions with Young-ae. - 'Mesugaki Young-ae!' Let's start! ♠ Game play - 20 questions! → Mesugaki Young-ae is playing twenty questions. The player will ask 20 questions and must enter the final correct answer. → Three questions are presented randomly at a turn, and the player can choose one question. → The answers to the questions are 'positive', 'negative', and 'neutral', and the user must infer the correct answer. → Young-ae sometimes gives a wrong answer with saying she doesn't know. Users can argue with the correct answer, but there is a limit to the number of times. → You can complete 20 questions, or you can guess the answer during the question. If you get it wrong, the user loses, but if you get it right, you win. → If correct, the user can select various enhancements. You can proceed with 20 questions that are more powerful while strengthening. ♠ Game Play - Date! → At the end of each of the three twenty questions, the user starts a dating event. → A total of four dating events will be held, leading to the final ending at the last event. → Users can choose a variety of ending choices, which can also lead to another story. ♠ Game Play - Extra Stage! → Players who have viewed the True Ending will enter the Extra Stage. → If you clear the extra stage of guessing Eugene Games' characters, the player can cancel the special ending. ♠ Game Information → Genre: Visual Nobel, Miyeon-si → Play method: Proceed with mouse click and fast forward with keyboard key → Play time: 1~2 hours (based on all clear) → Character Illustration: Chapter 3 → Ending: Seven
